context.!logs_path_localhost_access_log: {{ localLogsPathPrefix | default('/apps_ux/logs' if os === 'linux' else 'E:/apps_nt/logs') }}/{{ app | upper }}/{{ component | lower }}-wfprd/localhost_access_log.*.log
context.!logs_path_localhost: {{ localLogsPathPrefix | default('/apps_ux/logs' if os === 'linux' else 'E:/apps_nt/logs') }}/{{ app | upper }}/{{ component | lower }}-wfprd/localhost.*.log
context.!logs_path_catalina: {{ localLogsPathPrefix | default('/apps_ux/logs' if os === 'linux' else 'E:/apps_nt/logs') }}/{{ app | upper }}/{{ component | lower }}-wfprd/catalina.*.log
context.!logs_path_app: {{ localLogsPathPrefix | default('/apps_ux/logs' if os === 'linux' else 'E:/apps_nt/logs') }}/{{ app | upper }}/{{ component | lower }}-wfprd/{{ component | lower }}.log
